name: The Spoofer Project: Inferring the Extent of Source Address Filtering on the Internet
description: To understand the current state of network filtering, this paper presents an Internet-wide active measurement spoofing project. Our findings suggest that a large portion of the Internet is vulnerable to spoofing and concerted attacks employing spoofing remain a serious concern.

organizations: MIT Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory
MIT Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory
